channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned bin and black bag, 12th July
item.description:
This bin has been left abandoned here for at 4 -5 weeks . Itâ€™s in the alleyway . I spoke to the bin men about it and they said to report it to Greenwich as abandoned . When I have gone on this site it comes up as Peabody ? Please help just want it gone

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redwing Path, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter problem, 12th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light on constantly and too bright, 12th July
item.description:
This street lamp was replaced this week and is now on constantly. Please could the settings be changed so that it only comes on at night, as with the other street lights, not through the day. Also, this street light is directly outside my bedroom window and shines directly into the room. In 2016, the council agreed to install a shield around it that blocked the light from entering the room. I asked the engineers to reinstall the shield after replacing the lamp, but they did not do so. Could you please reinstall this shield as it is very intrusive? The case number in 2016 was 90709. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Charlwood Street, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Midfield Avenue, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Man hole is still the same, 12th July
item.description:
You have said the issue has been resolved when nothing has been done the man hole is worse than it has ever been whoever done a update saying the issue has been resolved should be coming out to inspect the work carried out all what has happened is Thames water have come out how many times in the last week and took photos maybe u need to get conways or someone who is able to carry out the whole to that needs to resolve this on going issue someone almost came off there motorcycle yesterday due to the state of the man hole I think that it is discussing that this has been going on for so long the tar mac which has been out over the man hole cover is almost gone the man hole is collapsed and should be level with the road not covered with some temporary tar mac what last a few days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Blackfen Road, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly damaged car left on Ancona Road, 12th July
item.description:
A car that has obviously been in an accident has been left on Ancona Road for over a week. It is badly damaged, has a wheel on the pavement, and broken glass is stren across the pavement and road. This is a serious health and safety risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ancona Road, Plumstead, London
